short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can lock specific tabs and clears non locked tabs on click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can lock specific tabs and clears non locked tabs on click
Keyboard short cuts:
     - alt + a : clears all non locked tabs
     - alt + l : locks/unlocks current tab
The area to the left shows all currently locked tabs titles and clicking on a title will open up that tab. (green highlighted titles represents tabs that are open for that active window)
